definition: like father, like son (idiom)

definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

father
certainly/must/will/necessarily
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. father a lion, son cannot be a dog (honorific); With a distinguished father such as you, the son is sure to do well./like father, like son
lit. If the upper beam is not straight, the lower beam will be crooked (idiom); fig. subordinates imitate their superiors' vices
pinyin: shang4 liang2 bu4 zheng4 xia4 liang2 wai1

definition: people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
related.word: 不是一家人不進一家門

definition: nobody understands one's son better than his father (idiom)
you can't judge a person by appearance (idiom)/you can't judge a book by its cover/often in combination 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量[ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2]
It is hard to change one's essential nature (idiom). You can't change who you are./Can the leopard change his spots? (Jeremiah 13:23)
you can't judge a person by appearance, just as you can't measure the sea with a pint pot (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2
related.word: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量

definition: a woman is born to leave her family (idiom)/a woman's heart is with her husband
A famous teacher trains a fine student (idiom). A cultured man will have a deep influence on his successors.
one's own (child) (i.e. one's child by birth)/biological (parents)/birth (parents)
those who handle cinnabar are stained red; those who work with ink are stained black (idiom)/you are the product of your environment
pinyin: jin4 zhu1 zhe3 chi4 , jin4 mo4 zhe3 hei1

definition: jackals of the same tribe (idiom); fig. They are all just as bad as each other.
no poison, no great man (idiom); A great man has to be ruthless.
even the wisest can have a momentary lapse in judgment (idiom)/every man has a fool in his sleeve
pinyin: cong1 ming5 yi1 shi4 , hu2 tu5 yi1 shi2
